name: pensando-policy-servicemanager
label: Pensando Policy Service Manager
description: Pensando's Policy and Services Manager (PSM) is a distributed system that leverages an intent-based model to deliver network and security policy to Pensando Distributed Services Cards for services implementation at the edge.

fields.title: Server Address
fields.name: server_address
fields.description: The address of the Pensando PSM server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Server Port
fields.name: port
fields.description: The port of the Pensando PSM server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Tenant
fields.name: tenant
fields.description: The tenant of the Pensando PSM server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.description: The username used to access the Pensando PSM server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.description: The password used to access the Pensando PSM server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Protocol
fields.name: protocol
fields.description: The protocol used to connect the Pensando PSM server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations. You can choose between HTTPS or HTTP.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. 
By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Debug - Remove Session State
operations.description: Debugs the login by removing the session state from the disk.

operations.title: Debug - Reset Session State
operations.description: Debugs the login by resetting the session state on the disk.

operations.title: Debug - Expire Auth Cookie
operations.description: Debugs the login by expiring the authentication cookie on the disk.

operations.title: Get Network Security Policies
operations.description: Retrieves the list of network security policies from the Pensando PSM server.

operations.title: Get Alerts
operations.description: Retrieves the list of alerts from the Pensando PSM server.

operations.title: Get Workloads
operations.description: Retrieves the list of workloads from the Pensando PSM server.

operations.title: Get Networks
operations.description: Retrieves the list of networks from the Pensando PSM server.

operations.title: Get Distributed Service Cards
operations.description: Retrieves the list of distributed service cards from the Pensando PSM server.

operations.title: Enable IPFIX Export for Host
operations.description: Enables IPFIX Flow Export of all flows for a source IP from the Pensando PSM server based on the IP address of the host source IP, the destination IP address of the IPFIX collector, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Host Source IP
parameters.name: host_source_ip
parameters.description: Specify the source IP of the host whose IPFIX flow exports you want to enable on the Pensando PSM server.

parameters.title: Interval
parameters.name: interval
parameters.tooltip: Should be a valid time duration between 1s and 24h0m0s. Example: 60s
parameters.description: Specify the time interval for pushing the records to an external collector. You must specify the value in the 'string' format, for example, '10s', '20m'. It should also be a valid time duration between 1s and 24h0m0s. For example, '60s'.

parameters.title: Template Interval
parameters.name: template_interval
parameters.tooltip: Should be a valid time duration between 1m0s and 30m0s. Example: 15m
parameters.description: Specify the time interval for sending IPFIX templates to an external collector. You must specify the value in the 'string' format, for example, '1m', '20m'. It should also be a valid time duration between 1m0s and 30m0s. For example, '15m'.

parameters.title: IPFIX Collector Destination IP
parameters.name: ipfix_collector_ip
parameters.description: Specify the IP address of the IPFIX collector.

parameters.title: IPFIX Collector Destination Gateway IP
parameters.name: ipfix_collector_gw_ip
parameters.description: Specify the gateway IP address for the IPFIX Collector.

parameters.title: IPFIX Collector Destination Protocol
parameters.name: ipfix_collector_protocol
parameters.description: Specify the protocol of the IPFIX Collector.

parameters.title: IPFIX Collector Destination Port
parameters.name: ipfix_collector_port
parameters.description: Specify the destination port of the IPFIX Collector.

operations.title: Delete existing IPFIX Export for Host
operations.description: Deletes IPFIX Flow Export of all flows for a source IP from the Pensando PSM server based on the IP address of the host source IP and the destination IP address of the IPFIX collector you have specified.

parameters.title: Host Source IP
parameters.name: host_source_ip
parameters.description: Specify the source IP of the host whose IPFIX flow exports you want to delete from the Pensando PSM server.

parameters.title: IPFIX Collector Destination IP
parameters.name: ipfix_collector_ip
parameters.description: Specify the destination port of the IPFIX Collector.

operations.title: Enable Mirror Traffic Export for Host
operations.description: Enables Mirror Traffic Export of traffic flows for a source IP on the Pensando PSM server based on the IP address of the host source IP, ERSPAN ID, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Host Source IP
parameters.name: host_source_ip
parameters.description: Specify the source IP of the host whose Mirror traffic exports you want to enable on the Pensando PSM server.

parameters.title: ERSPAN ID
parameters.name: erspan_id
parameters.description: Specify the ERSPAN ID, the value of which must be between 1 and 1023.

parameters.title: Packet Size
parameters.name: packet_size
parameters.description: Specify the maximum size of a mirrored packet. The packet size is not checked by default, and its value must be between 64 and 2048.

parameters.title: ERSPAN Type
parameters.name: erspan_type
parameters.description: Select the type of ERSPAN collector. You can choose between erspan_type_2 orâ€¯erspan_type_3.

parameters.title: ERSPAN Collector Destination IP
parameters.name: erspan_collector_ip
parameters.description: Specify the destination IP address of the ERSPAN Collector.

parameters.title: ERSPAN Collector Destination Gateway IP
parameters.name: erspan_collector_gw_ip
parameters.description: Specify the destination Gateway IP of the ERSPAN Collector.

parameters.title: Strip VLAN
parameters.name: strip_vlan
parameters.description: Select this option to remove VLAN from the mirrored packets.

parameters.title: Match Destination IP Addresses
parameters.name: erspan_match_dest_ip
parameters.description: Specify the destination IPs to be matched for the mirrored packets. You can specify a comma-separated list of a JSON array of IP addresses. For example, '10.1.1.1, 192.168.1.1' or '["10.1.1.1", "192.168.1.1"]'

parameters.title: Match Protocols and Ports
parameters.name: erspan_match_protocols
parameters.description: Specify the protocols and ports or port range to be matched for the mirrored packets. You can specify a comma-separated list of a JSON array of protocols and ports. For example, 'any, icmp, udp/500, tcp/80-88' or '["any", "icmp, udp/500", "tcp/80-88"]'

operations.title: Delete Existing Mirror Traffic Export for Host
operations.description: Deletes ERSPAN Mirror Traffic Export of all flows for a source IP from the Pensando PSM server based on the IP address of the host source IP and the destination IP address of the ERSPAN collector you have specified.

parameters.title: Host Source IP
parameters.name: host_source_ip
parameters.description: Specify the source IP of the host whose Mirror traffic exports you want to delete from the Pensando PSM server.

parameters.title: ERSPAN Collector Destination IP
parameters.name: erspan_collector_ip
parameters.description: Specify the destination IP address of the ERSPAN Collector.

operations.title: Isolate Host
operations.description: Quarantines on a specific host (disallows all North/South/East/West inbound and outbound traffic) on the Pensando PSM server based on the IP address of the host source IP you have specified.

parameters.title: Host Source IP
parameters.name: host_source_ip
parameters.description: Specify the source IP of the host that you want to quarantine on the Pensando PSM server.

operations.title: Unisolate Host
operations.description: Removes the quarantine on a specific host quarantine (Remove North/South/East/West inbound and outbound traffic block) on the Pensando PSM Server based on the IP address of the host source IP you have specified.

parameters.title: Host Source IP
parameters.name: host_source_ip
parameters.description: Specify the source IP of the host whose quarantine you want to remove from the Pensando PSM server.

operations.title: Add IOC IPs to Blocklist
operations.description: Add one or more specified IOC IPs to a block list on the Pensando PSM Server based on the IOC IP addresses you have specified.

parameters.title: IOC IP Address(es)
parameters.name: ioc_ip
parameters.tooltip: comma-separated list or a JSON Array.
parameters.description: Specify the IP addresses that you want to remove from the block list on the Pensando PSM server. You can specify a comma-separated list of a JSON array of IP addresses. For example, '10.1.1.1, 192.168.1.1' or '["10.1.1.1", "192.168.1.1"]'

operations.title: Remove IOC IPs from Blocklist
operations.description: Removes one or more specified IOC IPs from a block list on the Pensando PSM Server based on the IOC IP addresses you have specified.

parameters.title: IOC IP Address(es)
parameters.name: ioc_ip
parameters.tooltip: comma-separated list or a JSON Array.
parameters.description: Specify the IP addresses that you want to remove from the block list on the Pensando PSM server. You can specify a comma-separated list of a JSON array of IP addresses. For example, '10.1.1.1, 192.168.1.1' or '["10.1.1.1", "192.168.1.1"]'

operations.title: Remove IOC Blocklist
operations.description: Removes the complete IOC block list from the Pensando PSM Server.
